histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.AvailableSpaceAtRequest
histogram.summary: Amount of space, in MB, that is available on the Borealis VM disk when a client requests for more space. This is recorded each time a client makes a valid RequestSpace request.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.GetDiskInfoResult
histogram.summary: The results of a "GetDiskInfo" request from a client, which will either be a success or an error. This is recorded each time a client makes a GetDiskInfo request.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.NumRequestsPerSesssion
histogram.summary: The number of requests made by a client within a session of Borealis. This counts each time a client makes a disk related request (GetDiskInfo, RequestSpace and ReleaseSpace) and is emitted when Borealis is shutdown.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.ReleaseSpaceResult
histogram.summary: The results of a "ReleaseSpace" request from a client, which will either be a success or an error. This is recorded each time a client makes a ReleaseSpace request.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.RequestSpaceResult
histogram.summary: The results of a "RequestSpace" request from a client, which will either be a success or an error. This is recorded each time a client makes a RequestSpace request.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.SpaceReleased
histogram.summary: Amount of space, in MB, that is freed by the client (via a "ReleaseSpace" request). This is recorded each time a client makes a ReleaseSpace request. This is not necessarily the amount of space that the host frees, it is just the amount that the client signals as free.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Client.SpaceRequested
histogram.summary: Amount of space, in MB, that is requested by the client (via a "RequestSpace" request). This is recorded each time a client makes a RequestSpace request. This is not necessarily the amount of space granted by the client, it is just the amount that the client has requested.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Startup.Result
histogram.summary: The results of the disk sync process that is run when Borealis is launched. This relays if the disk needed to be resized, if it was done successfully or what error it faced. This is recorded each time the Borealis VM is launched, if the disk management feature is enabled.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.Startup.{TypeOfSpace}Space
histogram.summary: {TypeOfSpace} This is recorded each time the Borealis VM is launched, if the disk management feature is enabled.

variant.name: Available
variant.summary: Amount of available space, in MB, that Borealis has on its VM disk when it starts up.

variant.name: Expandable
variant.summary: Amount of space, in MB, that Borealis can expand its VM disk by.

variant.name: Total
variant.summary: Total amount of disk space, in MB, that Borealis has on its VM disk when it starts up.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.StatefulReadsDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis stateful KiB read per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.StatefulWritesDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis stateful KiB written per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.SwapReadsDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis swap file KiB read per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.SwapWritesDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis swap file KiB written per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.EngagementTime.{Variant}
histogram.summary: {Variant} Engagement time metrics, along with foreground and background time, are only collected on users with Borealis enabled. All four metrics are accumulated and recorded to UMA once a day.

variant.name: Background
variant.summary: Times when a user is engaged and Borealis apps are running in the background, but the user isn't focusing on an Borealis app window.

variant.name: BorealisTotal
variant.summary: Total of Borealis.EngagementTime.Background and .Foreground, which is the time the user is engaged and Borealis is running either in the foreground or background.

variant.name: Foreground
variant.summary: Times when a user is engaged and focuses on a Borealis GUI window.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: The number of Borealis installation attempts. This is recorded each time a user tries to install Borealis. Specifically, this metric is recorded when a user clicks on the install or retry button in the Borealis installer. It is intended that this metric is compared against the sum of Borealis.Install.Result as a way to measure silent failures.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.OverallTime
histogram.summary: Time taken for a successful installation. An install starts when the "install" or "retry" installer buttons are clicked and ends when the install completes successfully, at which point this metric is recorded. Note that retries are considered as their own individual installation attempts.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.Result
histogram.summary: The installation result, for example, a successful install, a cancelled install, or an error. This is recorded after an installation attempt has ended.

histogram.name: Borealis.Shutdown.Attempt
histogram.summary: Recording every attempt to exit Borealis given the that VM was launched. Recorded regardless of if the shutdown is successful.

histogram.name: Borealis.Stability
histogram.summary: A record of post-startup failures in Borealis components. Buckets are recorded to when we become aware that the corresponding component has failed.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: Recording every attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.OverallTime
histogram.summary: Recording the time taken for each successful attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.Result
histogram.summary: Recording the result of each attempt to start Borealis, whether it was successful or the error that it faced.
